mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO module (module_name, description) VALUES (#{moduleName}, #{description})

INSERT IGNORE INTO parameter ( module_name, parameter_name, added_version, required, defautl_value, description, is_free_form ) VALUES ( #{moduleName}, #{parameterName}, #{addedVersion}, #{required}, #{defautlValue}, #{description}, #{freeForm} )
INSERT IGNORE INTO choice ( module_name, parameter_name, choice_value ) VALUES ( #{moduleName}, #{parameterName}, #{choiceValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT module_name as moduleName, description as description FROM module WHERE module_name = #{moduleName}

SELECT module_name as moduleName, parameter_name as parameterName, added_version as addedVersion, required as required, defautl_value as defautlValue, description as description, is_free_form as freeForm FROM parameter WHERE module_name = #{moduleName}
SELECT module_name as moduleName, parameter_name as parameterName, choice_value as choiceValue FROM choice WHERE module_name = #{moduleName} AND parameter_name = #{parameterName}
SELECT module_name FROM module ORDER BY module_name
